ref.OrganizationRightExtension.Description: Расширение организационных прав на регистр "Программы": 1. Выводить записи регистра "Программы" которые являются вышестоящими для отфильтрованных по организационным правам (связь через поле "Вышестоящая программа" в актуальной записи регистра "Атрибуты программ"). 2. Выводить все вышестоящие программы для программ, отобранных по п.1. Связь такая же.
ref.OrganizationRightExtension.SqlTemplate:
select p.[id] as id, (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='Program') as [idEntity] from ( select a.[idProgram] as [id] from reg.AttributeOfProgram a where a.idParent = [{0}].[id]
union
select a.[idProgram] as [id] from reg.AttributeOfProgram a where a.[idParent] in ( select a.[idProgram] as [id] from reg.AttributeOfProgram a where a.idParent = [{0}].[id] ) ) as p

SELECT [dd1].[idOther] AS [id],-1744830423 AS [idEntity] FROM [doc].[TestDocument] AS dd1 WHERE dd1.[id] = {0}.[id] UNION SELECT [dd2].[idThis] AS [id], -1744830429 AS [idEntity] FROM [doc].[TestDocument] AS dd2 WHERE dd2.[id] ={0}.[id]

SELECT sp.[id] as id , (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='StateProgram') as [idEntity] FROM [doc].[StateProgram] sp WHERE sp.[id]= {0}.idMasterDoc UNION SELECT sp.[id] as id , (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='StateProgram') as [idEntity] FROM [doc].[StateProgram] sp WHERE sp.[id]= ( SELECT sp.idMasterDoc as [id] FROM [doc].[StateProgram] sp WHERE sp.[id]= {0}.idMasterDoc)

SELECT sp.[id] as id , (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='StateProgram') as [idEntity] FROM [doc].[StateProgram] sp WHERE sp.[id]= {0}.idMasterDoc UNION SELECT sp.[id] as id , (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='StateProgram') as [idEntity] FROM [doc].[StateProgram] sp Inner Join dbo.[GetDocumentVersionIds]({0}.id, (SELECT Top 1 [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='{0}')) cte on cte.id = sp.idMasterDoc UNION SELECT lgtp.[id] as id , (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='LongTermGoalProgram') as [idEntity] FROM [doc].[LongTermGoalProgram] lgtp Inner Join dbo.[GetDocumentVersionIds]({0}.id, (SELECT Top 1 [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='{0}')) cte on cte.id = lgtp.idMasterStateProgram UNION SELECT aspb.[id] as id , (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='ActivityOfSBP') as [idEntity] FROM [doc].[ActivityOfSBP] aspb Inner Join dbo.[GetDocumentVersionIds]({0}.id, (SELECT Top 1 [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='{0}')) cte on cte.id = aspb.idMasterDoc UNION SELECT aspb.[id] as id , (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='ActivityOfSBP') as [idEntity] FROM [doc].[ActivityOfSBP] aspb Inner Join [doc].[StateProgram] sp on aspb.idMasterDoc = sp.[id] Inner Join dbo.[GetDocumentVersionIds]([{0}].id, (SELECT Top 1 [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='{0}')) cte on cte.id = sp.idMasterDoc UNION SELECT lgtp.[id] as id , (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='LongTermGoalProgram') as [idEntity] FROM [doc].[LongTermGoalProgram] lgtp WHERE lgtp.idMasterStateProgram IN ( SELECT lgtp.[id] as id FROM [doc].[StateProgram] lgtp Inner Join dbo.[GetDocumentVersionIds]([{0}].id, (SELECT Top 1 [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='{0}')) cte on cte.id = lgtp.idMasterDoc )

SELECT sp.[id] as id , (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='StateProgram') as [idEntity] FROM [doc].[StateProgram] sp WHERE sp.[id]= {0}.idMasterStateProgram UNION SELECT sp.[id] as id , (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='StateProgram') as [idEntity] FROM [doc].[StateProgram] sp WHERE sp.[id]= ( SELECT sp.[idMasterStateProgram] as [id] FROM [doc].[LongTermGoalProgram] sp WHERE sp.[id]= {0}.idMasterLongTermGoalProgram) UNION SELECT lgtp.[id] as id , (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='LongTermGoalProgram') as [idEntity] FROM [doc].[LongTermGoalProgram] lgtp WHERE lgtp.idMasterLongTermGoalProgram={0}.[id] UNION SELECT lgtp.[id] as id , (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='LongTermGoalProgram') as [idEntity] FROM [doc].[LongTermGoalProgram] lgtp WHERE lgtp.[id]={0}.idMasterLongTermGoalProgram
SELECT sp.[id] as id , (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='StateProgram') as [idEntity] FROM [doc].[StateProgram] sp WHERE sp.[id]= {0}.idMasterDoc

SELECT sp.[id] as id , (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='StateProgram') as [idEntity] FROM [doc].[StateProgram] sp WHERE sp.[id]= {0}.idMasterStateProgram UNION SELECT sp.[id] as id , (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='StateProgram') as [idEntity] FROM [doc].[StateProgram] sp WHERE sp.[id]= ( SELECT sp.[idMasterStateProgram] as [id] FROM [doc].[LongTermGoalProgram] sp WHERE sp.[id]= {0}.idMasterLongTermGoalProgram) UNION SELECT lgtp.[id] as id , (SELECT [id] FROM [ref].[Entity] WHERE name='LongTermGoalProgram') as [idEntity] FROM [doc].[LongTermGoalProgram] lgtp WHERE lgtp.[id]={0}.idMasterLongTermGoalProgram
